legislation: Legislative Reform (Local Authority Consent Requirements) (England and Wales) Order 2007
description: Letter dated 17/01/2008 from Baroness Andrews to Baroness Scott of Needham Market regarding the deregulation of consent regimes to allow local authorities more freedom to take local decisions, following the debate on the Legislative Reform (Local Authority Consent Requirements) (England and Wales) Order 2007 on 13th December 2007.
department: Dept for Communities and Local Government
